name: Zero spring episode 1 Japanese version
description:
It is an FPS game with horror and suspense elements.
The unique part of this game is where there is a recovering character to support you. You have to fight while protecting her.
Health recovery will be difficult if you lose her.Zombies will not appear in this game.

Story
2054,Japan. Policemen conducted investigations on illegal building of hospital constructed by emerging religion but did not return.
Because it was a hospital for a settlement on the mountain,the investigation seems difficult.
The prefectural police decided to dispatch special forces.But the wife of the captain of the special forces was a nurse at this hospital.
The prefectural police asked to remove the captain from the assignment and take a vacation.
But the captain began climbing the mountain alone to investigate the hospital.
Hasegawa of information officer and Nagase of medical officer carefully supported the Player.

Please note..
This game is planned to implement trading cards and badges.
Please look for Zero spring episode 1 English translation version if you want to play this game in English.
A trained soldier will not appear in this episode.
Soldiers who trained from the next episode will appear and the difficulty level as a shooting game will rise slightly.
Please be careful when purchasing this game.
This game is made with GameGuru.
We can not do any support on the game's strategy.
